arts.ttl: Arsenal get huge update in quest for Martin Zubimendi – Ornstein
arts.sum: Arsenal are already planning for next season with Martin Zubimendi in mind, with reports suggesting they are operating as if the Real Sociedad midfielder is already their player, according to David Ornstein. The 25-year-old has been Mikel Arteta’s top midfield target for quite some time, and the Arsenal boss is said to be particularly drawn […] The post Arsenal get huge update in quest for Martin Zubimendi – Ornstein appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Arsenal Transfer News: Gunners to complete €60m Martin Zubimendi signing imminently - David Ornstein
arts.sum: Arsenal are expecting Zubimendi to join them from Real Sociedad in the summer. Arsenal are already operating on the assumption that Martin Zubimendi is their player, according to David Ornstein.
